title: Info Panel
description: This panel displays a description of whatever panel your are currently hovering over

title: Track Filters
description: This panel displays the filters assigned to the currently selected track

title: Tracks List
description: This is the list of tracks associated the current project. It includes track clips as well. Tracks and clips can be visually manipulated here.

title: Imports
description: This shows panel shows a list of imported clips and allows you to import and relink new clips

title: Filters List
description: Filters cane be selected from here and they will get added to the currently selected track
